ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is for closed lost opportunities to be read only.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ), NOT( $Permission.Finance_Contractor ), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Finance")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Order Operations Admin"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Closed Lost"), ISCHANGED(StageName) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Administrators can modify closed-lost opportunities.
